text: læa brrda phu xyak mi thana yeiyng khea meux wan ni ca klaw nı wan phrungni wa phung thrab theid pen thi næ nx nwaxallxhˌ nan thrng hı kwangkhwang læa thrng hı khabkhæb sung kheruxng yangchiph kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh cak pwng baw khxng phraxngkh hak mi chı xallxhˌ thrng pordpran kæ rea nænxn phraxngkh k ca thrng hı (thrni) sub rea lng pi phung thrab theid thæcring brrda phu ptiseth sraththa ca mi prasb chaychna
